page.title: 02PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: Dodworth.Pop. approx. 3000.Housing - council estate _recent private estates Shops include Post office,butcher, baker,D.I.Y.,shoe shop,chemist,general stores,off licences.Parish church of St.John(1848),square tower with pinnacles.Methodist Church existence since 1816.Schools_Dodworth C of E. Infants(1850),Dodworth Junior(1969) Five public houses notably Travellers Inn(1782)built as coaching inn.Gate Inn near site of turnpike gate on Barnsley_Penistone road.Public Library (1965)contains 12000 books.Mechanics Institute facilities for outdoor sports also karate,boxing,dancing,and indoor activities,base for Dodworth Majorettes.Council 0ffices(1914), Clinic(1980), War Memorial- soldier with rifle and bayonet sited at crossroads.
